title: Whoopi Suspension, Ted Cruz, ESPN's Aquisition, NFL Discrimination and more.

description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! There is a medicinal secret known to Big Dog that has been shown to prevent ulcers and other common ailments. The CLO tells a woman like it is about them numerous male friends of hers. Whoopi Goldberg has been suspended. What's going on America? Steve's VM was a bit heated. ESPN's acquisition got Junior talking. WYR went straight to Tommy's ego. Musiq Soulchild Verzuz Anthony Hamilton just in time for the middle of the month. Brian Flores and the NFL got something between them. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve has a gem about decision making as it pertains to your future.
